data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Toledo, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Toledo, Belize
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Toledo to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 9,285 believers in Toledo, Belize desire the Bible as newborn babies desire milk.
data.verse: Desire God’s pure word as newborn babies desire milk. Then you will grow in your salvation.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Toledo, Belize.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, English-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, you gave the church of Toledo, Belize the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Toledo who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Toledo, Belize has a population of 39,600.

We estimate Toledo has 9,285 people who might know Jesus, 24,864 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,450 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Toledo, Belize.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
